title: F2IDiff: Real-world Image Super-resolution using Feature to Image Diffusion Foundation Model
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: With the advent of Generative AI, Single Image Super-Resolution (SISR) quality has seen substantial improvement, as the strong priors learned by Text-2-Image Diffusion (T2IDiff) Foundation Models (FM) can bridge the gap between High-Resolution (HR) and Low-Resolution (LR) images.
